name: Versace
description: This collection celebrates bold femininity with vibrant prints and architectural silhouettes.
bio: Versace is an Italian luxury fashion company and trade name founded by Gianni Versace in 1978. The main collection is Versace, which produces upmarket Italian-made ready-to-wear and accessories, and distributes through its boutiques and department stores worldwide.

name: Gucci
description: A collection inspired by timeless elegance and contemporary flair, featuring rich textures and classic designs.
bio: Gucci is an Italian high-end luxury fashion house based in Florence, Italy. Its product lines include handbags, ready-to-wear, footwear, and accessories, makeup, fragrances, and home decoration. Gucci was founded in 1921 by Guccio Gucci in Florence, Tuscany.

name: Dior
description: Exploring the boundaries of craftsmanship with ethereal designs and intricate detailing.
bio: Christian Dior SE, commonly known as Dior, is a French luxury fashion house controlled and chaired by French businessman Bernard Arnault, who also heads LVMH, the world's largest luxury group. Dior itself holds 42.36% shares of and 59.01% voting rights within LVMH.
